maqras.text: Ana nganitunsapangulila (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ) chidali chenu (pakumpa utume)
Ni tuntuusile nsigo wenu (wausito wa kalungusye ka utenga, pakun’jepepachisya kalungusye kakwe)
Awula (nsigo wakwe) wawalumbisye n'gongo wenu
Ni tunnyakuliile kusaalidwa kwenu
Basi chisimu pakuli kunonopa pana kwepepala
Chisimu pakuli kunonopa pana kwepepala
Sano pati mmalisyisye (masengo genu), basi limbichilani (kutenda ibada)
Soni kwa Ambuje wenu pe (Allah) basi sachililani (ukoto Wakwe)
Nguulumbila nkuju ni nzaituni
Ni litumbi lya Sinai
Kwisa soni awu nsinda (wa Maaka) wantunjelele
Chisimu pamasile patun'gumbile mundu mu kagumbidwe kambone nnope
Kaneka nitukum'busyaaga kuwa jwapasi kwapunda wapasi wosope (pa uchekulu wakulepela nao kutenda yambone)
Ikaweje wandu waakulupilile ni kutendaga yambone (ali wachilimbanganile), basi akwete kupata wanganyao malipilo gangamala
Ana panyuma (pa kuimanya yele) nichichi chikuntendekasya kanila ya malipilo (ga pa Kiyama)
Ana Allah nganawa Nkwiilanya chenene (magambo) kwapunda akwiilanya wosope
Soomani mu lina lya Ambuje wenu (Allah) waagumbile
Agumbile mundu kuumila mu chipande chamyasi jekamatane
Soomani! Soni Ambuje wenu ni Wantuka kusyene
Awala waajiganyisye (kulemba) ni chakulembela
An'jiganyisye mundu yawalekaga ngaimanya
Yakuona! Chisimu mundu akuwaga jwakusumba mpika (pa kulikwesya)
Ligongo lyakuliona kusichila
Chisimu kwa Ambuje wenu pe (Allah) ni kwakuujila
Ana mum'bweni ajula jwaakuwa nkunkaanya
Kapolo (jwa Allah) ndema jajukusaka kuswali
Ana nkuyiona uli najuwaga (Muhammadi ﷺ) juli pachongoko
Kapena jukulamula ya woga (wakun'jogopa Allah)
Nambi nkuyiona uli nawaga (Abujahalio) akukanila ni kusyulula
Ana ngaakumanyilila yanti Allah akwaona (yaakutenda)
Ngwamba! Chisimu naga ngaakuleka, chiitwawuta umbo syapewuwo (pakwaponya ku Moto)
Liwuwo lyakwe lyaunami soni lyakulemwa
Basi waawilanje wandu wakwe (kuti ankamuchisye)
Nowe chitwawilanje Azabaniya (asilikali wa ku Moto)
Ngwamba! Mmwe ngasimunkunda jwalakwejo, nambo nsujuduji (kuswali) ni n’diwandichisyeje (kwa Allah)
Chisimu Uwwe tujitulwisye jalakwe (Qur'aniji) m’Chilo Chakuchimbichika
Ana ni chichi champaka chimmanyisye ya Chilo Chakuchimbichika
Chilo Chakuchimbichikachi chiwele chambone nnope kupunda myesi jakwana sausande
Achimalaika akasatulukaga pamo ni Nsimu (Jibulilu) mu Chele (Chilochi) kwa lisosa lya M’mbuje gwao, kwisa kulondesya chindu chilichose (pakuchiwika mu mpango wakwe)
Ntunjelele-tunjelelepe! Chele Chilocho, mpaka kumasikusiku

Wandu achimakafili kutandila achinsyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) kwisa soni wakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), nganawa alekangene (ni ukafili wao) kwikanila ndema ja chayichilile chilosyo chakuonechela palangulangu
(Jwali) Ntenga (Muhammadi ﷺ) jwakuumila kwa Allah jwaakusooma (Qur’an jajili mu) ikalakala yakuswejesyedwa
Mwalakwemo mwana malamusi gagoloka

Chisimu Allah akupeleka chanasa kwa Ntume (Muhammadi ﷺ), nombe nao soni Achimalaika (akum’bombelaga chanasa Ntumejo ﷺ). E jenumanja wankulupilile! Mum’bombelani chanasa jwalakwe ni kum’bombela soni ntendele

Ni nganalamulidwa ikaweje yanti an'galagatileje Allah mwakunswejechesya dini Jakwe pakupendechela ku Uujika Wakwe (nikutalikangana nayo isanamu), nikuti ajimicheje Swala mwakolosya ni kutolaga Zaka, soni jalakwejo ni dini jagoloka

Chisimu wandu waakanile (dini ja Usilamu); kutandila achinsyene chitabu (Ayuda ni Akilisito) kwisa soni wakuwanganya (Allah ni isanamu), chakawe m’moto wa Jahannama, chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo. Wanganyao ni iwumbe yakusakala nnope
Chisimu wandu waakulupilile nikutendaga yambone, wanganyao ni iwumbe yambone nnope

Malipilo gao kwa Ambuje wao chigakawe Matimbe Gandamo gasikujilima cha pasi pakwe sulo. Chakawe wandamo mwalakwemo kwa yaka ni yaka. Allah tachanonyela (pakwapochela masengo gao gambone), nombe nao tachinonyelwa Najo (pamalipilo gataachaapa). Yalakweyo ni yamundu jwatan'jogope M'mbujeegwe (Allah)
Pandema jalichitenganyika litaka nichisikinya chakwe chamachili
Ni kwisa koposya litaka misigo jakwe jausito (ichindu yayaliji nkati mwakwe, mpela malilo ni mitapo jambiya)
Ni kwisa kuwecheta mundu (mwawoga soni mwakusimonga kuti): “Litite uli (litaka, ana Kiyama jiyiche?)”
Lyele lisikulyo (litaka) lichiwecheta abali syakwe syosope (sya indu yayatendekwele pachanya pakwe yambone kapena yakusakala)
Ligongo lyanti Ambuje wenu tachililamula lyalakwelyo (kuti liwechete)
Lyele lisikulyo wandu tachipwilingana ali m'mikutula jakulekangana-lekangana kuti akaalosye masengo gao
Basi jwatapanganye chambone chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Nombe soni jwatapanganye chakusakala chausito wanti chisawu lunyilili, tachija kuchiona
Ngusilumbila hachi syasikuwutuka sili nkupumasika
Ni syasikoposya moto mu ikotwa mwakwe (pakuwutuka m’maganga)
Ni syasikwagungumuchila amagongo kumasikusiku
Nikututumya palakwepo luwundu lwejinji
Nikulijinjilila palakwepo likuga (lya amagongo)
Chisimu mundu kwa Ambujegwe (Allah) juwele jwakanila (ukoto waakumpa)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe jukuwichila umboni pa yalakweyo (kupitila mu itendo yakwe)
Soni chisimu jwalakwe pakuchinonyela chipanje juwele jwakupelenganya nnope
